name: Spacecraft
summary: Spacecraft is an arcade game in which the player takes on the role of a pilot of a futuristic vehicle, traversing tunnels and destroying hordes of hostile robots. The player's goal is to win the spaceship tournament taking place in diverse and interesting arenas. The authors of the game drew ideas mainly from the classic hit called Descent, while the individual gameplay elements and style from Quake III: Arena and Unreal Tournament. Players have 16 weapons at their disposal. The battlefield view mode can be switched between FPP and TPP at any time during the game. The authors have not forgotten about the fans of network games. You can play through a local LAN and the Internet. As the creators assure, the multiplayer mode has been very well optimized and even slower connections should not jeopardize the performance of a fascinating duel.
